stepAnswer: A research objective outlines the goals of the study, while a hypothesis is a testable prediction about the relationship between variables.
stepBody: What distinguishes a research objective from a hypothesis in a research study?
choices: A hypothesis is a broad statement of intent
A hypothesis outlines the goals of the study
A research objective is a testable prediction
A research objective outlines the goals of the study, while a hypothesis is a testable prediction about the relationship between variables
